paper_abstract: In this paper, we prove the generalized Hyers-Ulam stability of the additive functional inequality parallel to f(3x+2y+z) + f(x+2y+2z) + f(2x+2y+3z)parallel to <= parallel to 6f(x+y+z)parallel to in Banach spaces.
paper_title: On the stability of an additive functional inequality for the fixed point alternative
